title: Fresh Salmon Burgers
directions: Make Burgers: In food processor, pulse scallions, ginger, sesame oil, salt and pepper until finely minced, scraping down sides of processor bowl once or twice. Add egg white and soy sauce; pulse to blend. Add salmon. Pulse just until very finely chopped but not a paste. Shape into 6 burgers, each about 3/4 in. thick.

Coat burgers with nonstick spray. Grill, turning once, until done as desired (6 minutes for medium-rare, which is preferred).Place on lettuce leaves. Top each with wasabi mayonnaise, ginger slices and sprouts; sprinkle with a pinch or two of sesame seeds.
ingredients: 1 tbsp. pickled ginger slices (found in your market's Asian section)
Â¼ tsp. each salt and freshly ground pepper
2 lb. piece salmon fillet (preferably sockeye or coho)
Toppings: wasabi mayonnaise, pickled ginger slices and radish sprouts
